rooms.name: DormRoom
rooms.description: You are in your dorm room in Snyder Hall. Your stuff is littered everywhere.

rooms.name: SnyderHallway
rooms.description: You are in the Snyder Hallway. You hear people playing music and talking.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You are in the bathroom. It smells of cleaning solution, and someone forgot to flush the urinal again.

rooms.name: Staircase
rooms.description: You are walking in the staircase. Every little noise you make echoes up and down the stairs.

rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: You are in the main Snyder lobby. There are a few people playing video games and studying here.

rooms.name: Outside
rooms.description: You are now outside in the six pack, but you forgot to put on shoes and your feet are freezing.

rooms.name: LaundryRoom
rooms.description: You walk into the laundry room, but someone is taking out your clothes from the dryer. You proceed to beat them up.
